rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with Bohemian accents such as reclaimed wood and colorful textiles.
Spacious living area featuring floor-to-ceiling windows for ample natural light, decorative Bohemian elements like vintage art pieces and eclectic furniture.
A modern dining area integrated within the living space with a wooden dining table, ambient lighting, and open layout to enhance community feel.
A functional kitchenette with contemporary design elements, sufficient storage, and easy access to dining area; decorated in Bohemian style with vibrant tiles.
Guest bedroom featuring a calming Bohemian theme with plush seating and soft lighting for comfort.
Dedicated space for laundry and storage, designed to be functional yet in harmony with the farmhouse style.

openings.features: Wide entrance door with glass accents, integrated security system.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows that offer panoramic views and let natural light flood the interior.

openings.features: Balcony door leading to a small patio area for an al fresco dining experience.

amenities.description: A spacious rooftop terrace offering panoramic views, open design, and ample space for social gatherings, respecting Vastu principles by ensuring proper alignment with cardinal directions.
